mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoCnsltMemo Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MEMO_SN , MEMO_REGTR_ID , CSTMR_TP_CD , EXPSR_YN , MEMO_CONT , MEMO_TP_CD , ORD_NO , CLM_NO , MBR_NO , GOD_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CNSLT_MEMO WHERE 1 = 1 AND MEMO_SN = #{memoSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoCnsltMemo Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM CSO_CNSLT_MEMO WHERE 1 = 1 AND MEMO_SN = #{memoSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
